title: "Sarcos merges with RE2, aims to have robots take on dangerous jobs"
excerpt: "Sarcos and RE2 grew up working on defense projects but they’re now aiming to expand and take on industrial roles. They’re particularly interested in supporting and maybe replacing humans working unstructured spaces where complete automation is difficult."
